get.summary: aggrator transactions -- accessible to the aggregator and admin
aggregator merchants -- allows owner and admin

post.summary: change aggregator password -- cannot use the previous 10 passwords

get.summary: merchant transactions -- allows merchant n, merchant n's aggregator and admin
transaction stats for merchant X -- alows X and his aggregator and admin

patch.summary: activate merchant -- allows aggregator that owns merchant
deactivate merchant -- allows aggregator that owns merchant

post.summary: change merchant password -- cannot use the previous 10 passwords

get.summary: total count  -- group by status or by month -- admin only
transactions for all aggregators -- EXCEPT socialpay and direct-merchant aggregtors -- admin only
transaction stats for external aggregators -- admin only
get total pending -- allows admin only
